#anime #ayanami_rei #evangelion #universal

Ayanami Rei

"You won't die because I will protect you"

Artist: https://twitter.com/bugsing?s=20

Source: https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/4921303?q=ayanami_rei

Sights for M60A3 TTS and Chinese M60A3 TTS for simulator battles. HEATFS shell only. I will most likely make a sight for dart too if I grind it so far.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change the colour of the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#sb #sim #simulator #simulatorbattles #m60tts #m60a3 #m60a3tts #m_60a3

Asda Toda Universal tank sight

How to install:

1) Go to WarThunder/UserSights

2) Create a folder and name it "all_tanks"

3) Put BLK file in said folder

4) Avoid death by anime girl distraction


Sight implementation by @DSplayer

#anime #raiden_shogun #genshin_impact #universal

Just Raiden Shogun

Source: https://imgur.com/BbSaWHX

Исторический прицел Stuvi5b только все как с гироскопическим прицелом Ez42 без механики перемещения "целика", гайджин так и "не завезла" ее
Этот прицел использовался для точной бомбардировки с отвесного или пологова пикирования на Ju-87d и Ме-410А

#Stuvi5b #collimator #Ju-87d5 #Me-410

#anime #kancolle #graf_zeppelin #c2a1 #c2a1_mexas
English-
These days, I couldn't think of a proper painting to make, so I made a view. Instead of this, I tried to make it a Skadi of ArKnights, but it took a little long, so I made it in a hurry as a countermeasure.This is the Graf zepelin that goes into C2A1.

You need the germ_leopard_c2_mexas folder to apply it.
For the germ_leopard_c2_mexas file, you can add the aiming part file in the normal setting during the test run.

한국어-
요즘 만들 도색이 마땅하게 생각이 안나서 한번 조준경을 만들어봤습니다. 이거 말고 명일방주의 스카디로 할려 했으나 쫌 오래 걸려서 그 대책용으로 급하게 만들어보았습니다.이건 C2A1에 들어가는...

#anime #savage #arknights #universal

"Roar!"

Artist: https://twitter.com/AT_Kitsune?s=20

Source: https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/4467092?q=savage_

Прицел для штурмовки связанный с углом атаки

По центру планка для вычисления расстояния
А под ней где произойдет сброс под 400-450км/ч отрегулирован
Каждые 5 градусов это 50м и я выбрал 3 самых лучших угла для атаки
Если скорость больше 500 то цельтесь чуть ниже
Если скорость меньше 400 то чуть выше цельтесь

Attack sight associated with the angle of attack

Center bar for calculating distance
And under it, where there will be a discharge under 400-450 km / h, it is adjusted
Every 5 degrees is 50m and I chose the 3 best attack angles.
If the speed is more than 500 then aim a ...

Вы контуженный штурмовик? Не беда
Прицел для СБ штурмовки (можно и для РБ, но не рекомендуется)
Определяете дистанцию заход под 10-15 градусов (как на 2 картинке примерно)
Берете упреждение для неподвижной цели летя под ≈450км/ч (или куда направляется цель)
Сброс и Бум, 50кг поражает цель

Are you a shell-shocked stormtrooper? No problem
Sight for SB assault (possible for RB, but not recommended)
Determination of the approach distance at 10-15 degrees (as in the 2 picture approximately)
Take a lead for a stationary target flying under ≈450 km / h (or where the target is headed)
Dro...

!!! For those, who don't know how to instal user-made sighting reticles !!!

1) \ WarThunder \ UserSights \ all_tanks <- upload files from .zip to this folder(i create the "all_tanks" folder, so you need put it in "UserSight". If it is not there, then you need to create it.
2) In the game / Game options / General combat settings / Use an...
